original_text: This is what the Almighty Lord God says: No foreigner may go into my holy place if he is not circumcised and he does not want to obey me. Even if that foreigner lives among my people, the Israelites, he must not go in there.
korean_text: 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하셨느니라 이스라엘 족속 중에 있는 이방인 중에 마음과 몸에 할례를 받지 아니한 이방인은 내 성소에 들어오지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: This is what the Almighty Lord God says:
No foreigner may go into my holy place
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 외국인도 나의 거룩한 곳에 들어갈 수 없다

sentences.original_text: and he does not want to obey me.
Even if that foreigner lives among my people,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 외국인이 나의 백성인 이스라엘 사람들 중에 살더라도

sentences.original_text: he must not go in there.
